Database

Class LoginManagement

  • java.lang.Object
    • Database.Management
      • Database.LoginManagement

  • public class LoginManagement
extends Management
    Created by Evdal on 03.03.2016. Uses connection created in DatabaseConnection to send statement to usertable.

    • Method Detail

      • login

        public java.lang.Object[] login(java.lang.String user,
                                java.lang.String pass)
        Users are stored in their own table in the database. They have information such as username, password(Hash and salt) as well as access-level. login returns an int, which is their access-level, if -1 is returned, their password or username was wrong.
        Parameters:
        user - Username.
        pass - Password.
        Returns:
        User object.
